summary:
MIO-CHAN - Meet MIO-chan

Mio is no ordinary Shiba Inu—she comes from ​the same breeder as the legendary Kabosu, ​the face of Doge. Recently discovered as one ​of the few Shiba Inus with this connection, ​Mio was around the same age as Kabosu ​when they were abandoned by the breeder, ​suggesting they might even be sisters. Now, ​Mio is ready to make her own impact and ​bring joy, just like her famous relative.
